diversityNote: MANDATORY: All images with people must include diverse representation. Rotate through demographics: African American, Hispanic/Latino, Asian, South Asian, Middle Eastern, White, and mixed race. Balance genders 50/50 across course.

scenes.heading: Welcome to Excellence in Entrepreneurship
scenes.narration: Welcome to Excellence in Entrepreneurship. Over the next seven weeks, you'll transform from idea to confident entrepreneur.
scenes.visualDescription: A majestic mountain landscape at golden hour, with a glowing teal pathway winding toward the summit.

scenes.heading: Your 7-Week Journey
scenes.narration: Think of this program as climbing a mountain. Each week, you'll advance to a new base camp, building skills and confidence as you ascend.
scenes.visualDescription: a Black woman entrepreneur, African American woman at base camp looking up at a glowing mountain trail ascending into the distance., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Summit Awaits
scenes.narration: By Week 7, you'll reach the summit with a refined business concept, validated customer insights, and a clear path to market.
scenes.visualDescription: Mountain trail with glowing waypoints showing weekly progress markers.

scenes.heading: Three Paths, One Journey
scenes.narration: Whether you're building software, offering professional services, or creating physical products, this program is designed for you.
scenes.visualDescription: Three diverse Hispanic man entrepreneurs standing together at a mountain base camp.

scenes.heading: You're Not Climbing Alone
scenes.narration: You're not climbing alone. Your cohort of fellow entrepreneurs will challenge you, support you, and hold you accountable.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of Asian woman entrepreneurs gathered around a campfire at mountain base camp.

scenes.heading: Let's Begin Your Ascent
scenes.narration: The live sessions each week bring everything together. Let's begin your ascent.
scenes.visualDescription: Sunrise over mountain summit with golden light illuminating the path ahead.

scenes.heading: The Mind of an Entrepreneur
scenes.narration: Before strategies and tactics, there's something more fundamental that determines entrepreneurial success: how you think.
scenes.visualDescription: A contemplative South Asian man entrepreneur meditating on a rocky outcrop at dawn., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Mindset is a Skill
scenes.narration: The good news? Mindset isn't fixed. It's a skill you can develop through practice.
scenes.visualDescription: a White man entrepreneur, Caucasian man's silhouette against a sunrise, showing transancient expedition journalation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Fixed vs. Growth Mindset
scenes.narration: Carol Dweck's research shows that our beliefs about our abilities shape our outcomes. Fixed mindset believes talent is innate.
scenes.visualDescription: a South Asian woman entrepreneur, Indian woman at a mountain crossroads, transitioning from shadow to light., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Growth Mindset
scenes.narration: Growth mindset believes skills can be developed. In entrepreneurship, growth mindset isn't optional—it's survival.
scenes.visualDescription: a Middle Eastern man entrepreneur, Arab man stepping into the light, showing transancient expedition journalation and growth., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: 5 Mental Frameworks
scenes.narration: Beyond growth mindset, five specific mental frameworks separate thriving entrepreneurs. Bias toward action: test and learn by doing. Comfortable with ambiguity: decide with incomplete information.
scenes.visualDescription: A confident Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur with five glowing beacon towers behind her., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Frameworks 4 & 5
scenes.narration: Customer obsession: genuine curiosity about problems. Resilient optimism: believe in outcomes while acknowledging obstacles. Long-term thinking: build lasting value over quick wins.
scenes.visualDescription: a White woman entrepreneur, Caucasian woman looking at the horizon with beacon towers illuminating the path., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Failure is Data
scenes.narration: The fear of failure stops more entrepreneurs than actual failure ever could. Here's the reframe: failure isn't a verdict on your abilities. It's data.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur thoughtfully studying a map at a mountain camp.

scenes.heading: Fail Fast, Learn Faster
scenes.narration: Every setback contains information. Edison found 10,000 ways that didn't work. Your job is to fail fast, learn faster, and keep moving.
scenes.visualDescription: a Black man entrepreneur, African American man rising from the ground, determined to continue climbing., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Why Your Pitch Matters
scenes.narration: You have exactly 30 seconds. That's how long you typically have to make a first impression.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur in a mountain cable car ascending toward a summit station.

scenes.heading: First Impressions Count
scenes.narration: Whether it's a potential investor, customer, or partner—your elevator pitch is your first opportunity to create connection and curiosity.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur in a mountain cable car ascending toward a summit station.

scenes.heading: The Pitch Formula
scenes.narration: Great pitches follow a simple formula. Five elements in 30 seconds.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur pointing at a hologlowing teal energy streamsic display showing five ascending steps., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Five Key Elements
scenes.narration: Start with a hook that grabs attention—a surprising fact or bold statement. Then describe the problem you solve and your unique solution.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur pointing at a hologlowing teal energy streamsic display showing five ascending steps., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Proof and Ask
scenes.narration: Add why you're credible, and end with a clear ask. Let's break each one down with real examples.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur pointing at a hologlowing teal energy streamsic display showing five ascending steps., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Pitch in Action
scenes.narration: Here's how it sounds for each entrepreneur persona. Let's hear three real examples.
scenes.visualDescription: Three diverse Hispanic woman entrepreneurs practicing pitches around a campfire.

scenes.heading: Digital Builder Pitch
scenes.narration: Digital Builder: 'We help SaaS founders reduce churn by 40% using AI-powered customer health scoring.'
scenes.visualDescription: Three diverse Asian man entrepreneurs practicing pitches around a campfire.

scenes.heading: Expert Pitch
scenes.narration: Expert: 'I transform struggling sales teams into top performers through my proven 90-day methodology.'
scenes.visualDescription: Three diverse South Asian man entrepreneurs practicing pitches around a campfire.

scenes.heading: Maker Pitch
scenes.narration: Maker: 'Our eco-friendly packaging helps restaurants cut waste costs while delighting environmentally-conscious diners.'
scenes.visualDescription: Three diverse Middle Eastern woman entrepreneurs practicing pitches around a campfire.

scenes.heading: Practice Makes Progress
scenes.narration: The best pitches feel effortless because they've been practiced hundreds of times.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur recording herself practicing a pitch., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Refine Your Pitch
scenes.narration: Record yourself, time it, refine it. Test it on friends and strangers. Watch their eyes—when do they light up? When do they check out?
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur recording herself practicing a pitch., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Start Messy, Get Better
scenes.narration: Your pitch will evolve as your business does. Start messy, get better every time.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur recording herself practicing a pitch., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: See Your Summit
scenes.narration: Before we dive deeper into skills and strategies, let's get crystal clear on where you're headed.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur looking at a distant mountain summit through a telescope.

scenes.heading: Define Success
scenes.narration: What does success look like for you at the end of these seven weeks?
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur looking at a distant mountain summit through a telescope.

scenes.heading: Worth the Investment
scenes.narration: What specific outcome would make this investment of time worthwhile?
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur looking at a distant mountain summit through a telescope.

scenes.heading: SMART Goals Framework
scenes.narration: Vague goals produce vague results. Use the SMART framework to sharpen your objectives.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur at a mountain planning station with SMART markers on a map.

scenes.heading: Specific & Measurable
scenes.narration: Specific means clearly defined—not 'grow my business' but 'acquire 10 paying customers.' Measurable means you can track progress.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur at a mountain planning station with SMART markers on a map.

scenes.heading: Achievable & Relevant
scenes.narration: Achievable means it stretches you but is realistic. Relevant means it aligns with your bigger vision.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur at a mountain planning station with SMART markers on a map.

scenes.heading: Time-bound
scenes.narration: Time-bound means it has a deadline.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur at a mountain planning station with SMART markers on a map.

scenes.heading: Weekly Milestones
scenes.narration: Your summit goal needs waypoints. Each week should have a specific milestone that moves you closer.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur looking at a mountain path with seven glowing base camps.

scenes.heading: Weeks 1 & 2
scenes.narration: Week 1: clearly define your business concept. Week 2: complete five customer interviews.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur looking at a mountain path with seven glowing base camps.

scenes.heading: Weeks 3 & 4
scenes.narration: Week 3: create an MVP or prototype. Week 4: make your first real sales pitch.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur looking at a mountain path with seven glowing base camps.

scenes.heading: Stay Accountable
scenes.narration: These milestones keep you accountable and show real progress.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur looking at a mountain path with seven glowing base camps.

scenes.heading: The Power of Writing
scenes.narration: Goals written down are 42% more likely to be achieved than goals kept in your head.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur writing goals in a leather journal at a cozy mountain lodge.

scenes.heading: Take Action
scenes.narration: Take a moment now to write your summit goal and your first weekly milestone.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur writing goals in a leather journal at a cozy mountain lodge.

scenes.heading: Commit to Your Journey
scenes.narration: Share it with your cohort. When others know your goals, accountability multiplies. Your journey starts with this commitment.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur writing goals in a leather journal at a cozy mountain lodge.

videos.title: Going to the Moon Without a Rocket

scenes.heading: Going to the Moon Without a Rocket
scenes.narration: Imagine trying to get to the moon without building a rocket first.
scenes.visualDescription: a Black woman entrepreneur, African American woman silhouette on a cliff looking up at a massive moon, empty launch pad below., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Absurd Reality
scenes.narration: You'd spend millions on the mission, hire a team, set a launch date... then realize you have no way to get there. Absurd, right?
scenes.visualDescription: a Hispanic man entrepreneur, Latino man silhouette on a cliff looking up at a massive moon, empty launch pad below., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Why Startups Fail
scenes.narration: Yet this is exactly what most entrepreneurs do. According to CB Insights, 42% of startups fail because there's no market need.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur studying expedition maps and data at a mountain observation outpost.

scenes.heading: Other Failure Reasons
scenes.narration: They built something nobody wanted. They went to the moon without a rocket.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur studying expedition maps and data at a mountain observation outpost.

scenes.heading: Customer Discovery Is Your Rocket
scenes.narration: Customer discovery is your rocket. It's the process of validating that real people have real problems.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur engaged in conversation with a South Asian man at a mountain waystation.

scenes.heading: Before You Build
scenes.narration: Before you invest months or years building a solution, you need to know the problem actually exists.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur engaged in conversation with a South Asian man at a mountain waystation.

scenes.heading: Obsessively Curious
scenes.narration: The best entrepreneurs are obsessively curious about their customers. They ask questions constantly.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur engaged in conversation with a South Asian man at a mountain waystation.

scenes.heading: Assume You're Wrong
scenes.narration: They assume they're wrong until proven right.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur engaged in conversation with a South Asian man at a mountain waystation.

scenes.heading: The Discovery Loop
scenes.narration: This isn't a one-time exercise. It's a continuous loop: Form a hypothesis, test it with real customers.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur walking on a spiral mountain path representing the iterative loop.

scenes.heading: The Cycle
scenes.narration: Learn from what you hear, adjust your assumptions, then repeat. Over and over again.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur walking on a spiral mountain path representing the iterative loop.

scenes.heading: Speed to Product-Market Fit
scenes.narration: The faster you can move through this loop, the faster you'll find product-market fit.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur walking on a spiral mountain path representing the iterative loop.

scenes.heading: Your Discovery Toolkit
scenes.narration: This week, we'll give you the tools to build your rocket.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with discovery tools - compass, binoculars, journal, magnifying glass., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Four Tools
scenes.narration: You'll learn to form testable hypotheses, conduct unbiased interviews, and capture insights that actually matter.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with discovery tools - compass, binoculars, journal, magnifying glass., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Let's Begin
scenes.narration: Let's start with the hypothesis.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with discovery tools - compass, binoculars, journal, magnifying glass., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Building Your Customer Hypothesis
scenes.narration: Many entrepreneurs describe their ideal customer too broadly.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing detailed customer persona sketches with sticky notes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Specificity Problem
scenes.narration: Small business owners. Busy professionals. These descriptions are so vague they're useless for customer discovery.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing detailed customer persona sketches with sticky notes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Be Specific and Wrong
scenes.narration: It's better to be specific and wrong than vague and right. Specific hypotheses can be tested and corrected.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing detailed customer persona sketches with sticky notes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Four-Part Hypothesis
scenes.narration: Your customer hypothesis should answer four key questions.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man colleague contributing ideas to a whiteboard with four quadrants at a mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Questions 1 & 2
scenes.narration: Who is your ideal customer? What problem do they have? Be specific about demographics, behaviors, and pain points.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man colleague contributing ideas to a whiteboard with four quadrants at a mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Questions 3 & 4
scenes.narration: How do they solve it today? Why would they pay for your solution? These questions reveal your real competition.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man colleague contributing ideas to a whiteboard with four quadrants at a mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Real Example: B2B SaaS
scenes.narration: Let's see a complete example. An HR software startup targeting mid-size companies.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur reviewing a detailed customer profile expedition map with glowing trail markers at a glass-walled mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: WHO: HR Directors
scenes.narration: WHO: HR Directors at mid-size tech companies with 100 to 500 employees. They report to the VP of People.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur reviewing a detailed customer profile expedition map with glowing trail markers at a glass-walled mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: WHAT: The Problem
scenes.narration: PROBLEM: New employee onboarding takes 20+ hours of HR time per hire. Paper forms get lost.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur reviewing a detailed customer profile expedition map with glowing trail markers at a glass-walled mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: HOW & WHY
scenes.narration: CURRENT SOLUTION: Spreadsheets and email chains. PRICING: They'd pay 15 to 25 dollars per employee per month to cut onboarding time by 80%.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur reviewing a detailed customer profile expedition map with glowing trail markers at a glass-walled mountain outpost., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Go For The No
scenes.narration: When testing pricing, don't lowball to make sales easier.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur in a negotiation stance at a mountain trading post, confident posture.

scenes.heading: Price High Enough
scenes.narration: Propose a price high enough that some people will decline. If everyone says yes, you're leaving money on the table.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur in a negotiation stance at a mountain trading post, confident posture.

scenes.heading: Learn From Rejection
scenes.narration: When someone says that's too expensive, ask follow-up questions. What would you expect to pay? What would make it worth it?
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur in a negotiation stance at a mountain trading post, confident posture.

scenes.heading: Your Assignment
scenes.narration: Before the live session, complete your Customer Hypothesis Template.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur filling out a planning carved mountain stone marker at expedition base camp, journal and compass nearby., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Be Specific
scenes.narration: Be specific enough to be wrong. You'll refine this hypothesis as you conduct customer interviews.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur filling out a planning carved mountain stone marker at expedition base camp, journal and compass nearby., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: What's Next
scenes.narration: In Lesson 3, you'll learn the interview techniques to test this hypothesis with real potential customers.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur filling out a planning carved mountain stone marker at expedition base camp, journal and compass nearby., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Building the House
scenes.narration: Think of a customer interview like building a house.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur with blonde hair engaged in deep conversation with an Asian woman at mountain observation deck., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Foundation First
scenes.narration: You need to lay the foundation before you can put up walls, and walls before you can add a roof.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur with blonde hair engaged in deep conversation with an Asian woman at mountain observation deck., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Don't Rush
scenes.narration: Rush to the roof too early, and the whole thing collapses.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur with blonde hair engaged in deep conversation with an Asian woman at mountain observation deck., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Seven Deadly Sins
scenes.narration: Before we cover what works, let's address common mistakes.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur reviewing notes with a concerned expression at a mountain waystation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Don't Pitch or Lead
scenes.narration: Don't pitch your solution. Don't ask leading questions.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur reviewing notes with a concerned expression at a mountain waystation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Listen and Dig Deeper
scenes.narration: Don't talk more than you listen. And don't accept vague answers without digging deeper.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur reviewing notes with a concerned expression at a mountain waystation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Foundation: Build Rapport
scenes.narration: Start with the foundation. Spend 2-3 minutes building rapport.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur warmly greeting a Hispanic man at the entrance of a mountain outpost.

scenes.heading: Thank Them
scenes.narration: Thank them for their time. Set expectations that there are no right or wrong answers.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur warmly greeting a Hispanic man at the entrance of a mountain outpost.

scenes.heading: Get Permission
scenes.narration: Get permission to take notes. Verify they match your target customer profile.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur warmly greeting a Hispanic man at the entrance of a mountain outpost.

scenes.heading: Walls: Explore Their World
scenes.narration: The walls are where you spend most of your time — 10 to 15 minutes exploring their world.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur actively listening and taking notes while an Asian woman shares her story., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Ask About Experiences
scenes.narration: Ask about specific experiences. What was the last time they dealt with this problem?
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur actively listening and taking notes while an Asian woman shares her story., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Understand the Process
scenes.narration: What's their typical process? What's most frustrating?
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur actively listening and taking notes while an Asian woman shares her story., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Roof: Test Your Hypothesis
scenes.narration: Only after building foundation and walls do you add the roof — testing your hypothesis.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woman Asian woman entrepreneur, East Asian woman presenting a simple concept sketch to a group at a mountain summit meeting., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: What Would Make Them Switch?
scenes.narration: Spend just 5 to 7 minutes here. Ask what would make them switch from their current approach.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma White man entrepreneur, Caucasian man presenting a simple concept sketch to a group at a mountain summit meeting., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Value and Price
scenes.narration: What would they be willing to pay?
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma South Asian woman entrepreneur, Indian woman presenting a simple concept sketch to a group at a mountain summit meeting., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: From Interviews to Insights
scenes.narration: Conducting interviews is only half the battle.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma Middle Eastern man entrepreneur, Arab man analyzing hologlowing teal energy streamsic data visualization screens inside a geodesic dome command center., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Systematic Capture
scenes.narration: The real value comes from systematically capturing what you learn and recognizing patterns.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma White woman entrepreneur, Caucasian woman analyzing hologlowing teal energy streamsic data visualization screens inside a geodesic dome command center., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Build Your Database
scenes.narration: Build a customer insight database that grows smarter with every interview.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma Black man entrepreneur, African American man analyzing hologlowing teal energy streamsic data visualization screens inside a geodesic dome command center., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Four Categories
scenes.narration: Your insight database should capture four categories of information.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing research notes on a digital stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst with color-coded categories., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Basic Info & Problem Data
scenes.narration: Basic info about the interviewee and their profile match. Problem data including pain level and frequency.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing research notes on a digital stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst with color-coded categories., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Solution & Meta Insights
scenes.narration: Solution validation including pricing reactions. And meta insights like surprising quotes and new questions.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing research notes on a digital stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst with color-coded categories., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Finding Patterns
scenes.narration: After five to ten interviews, start looking for patterns.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur mapping connections between data points on a large expedition planning board., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Rule of Three
scenes.narration: Use the Rule of Three. Don't pivot based on one interview. Look for at least three people saying the same thing.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur mapping connections between data points on a large expedition planning board., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Validation Signals
scenes.narration: Strong validation signals include multiple people describing the problem identically and spending money on partial solutions.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur mapping connections between data points on a large expedition planning board., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Strongest Signal
scenes.narration: The strongest signal is when people offer to pay without being asked.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur mapping connections between data points on a large expedition planning board., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Pivot Triggers
scenes.narration: Sometimes the data tells you to change direction. Know when to pivot.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a mountain crossroads, considering different paths with signposts., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Warning Signs
scenes.narration: Consider pivoting when pain levels are consistently low or people are satisfied with current solutions.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a mountain crossroads, considering different paths with signposts., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: More Red Flags
scenes.narration: Also pivot when the problem exists but people won't pay to solve it, or you can't find people who match your hypothesis.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a mountain crossroads, considering different paths with signposts., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Your Mission
scenes.narration: Your mission: conduct at least five interviews before Week 3.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of Hispanic woman entrepreneurs gathered at observation outpost reviewing their collective findings together., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Five Interviews
scenes.narration: Log each interview in your insight database. Look for patterns across conversations.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of Asian man entrepreneurs gathered at observation outpost reviewing their collective findings together., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Be Willing to Be Wrong
scenes.narration: Be willing to be wrong. That's how you get closer to right.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of South Asian man entrepreneurs gathered at observation outpost reviewing their collective findings together., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Start with the End in Mind
scenes.narration: Before you build anything, you need to deeply understand what your user is experiencing.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur observing users at a modern glass-walled mountain maker lab with 3D printers and whiteboards., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Gap Between Want and Need
scenes.narration: Not what they tell you they want, but what they actually need. The gap between these two is where great products are born.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur observing users at a modern glass-walled mountain maker lab with 3D printers and whiteboards., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Pain Point Sources
scenes.narration: Pain points come from multiple sources. Let's explore the four key categories.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur organizing pain point data on sticky notes across a large planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Four Sources
scenes.narration: Direct feedback from interviews. Behavioral observations when watching users work. Competitive analysis of market gaps. And industry trends creating new problems.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur organizing pain point data on sticky notes across a large planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Stated vs Unstated Needs
scenes.narration: Customers describe solutions, not underlying needs.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing the connection between surface requests and deeper needs., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Faster Horse
scenes.narration: When someone asks for 'a faster horse,' the real need is getting places quickly and reliably.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing the connection between surface requests and deeper needs., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Key Question
scenes.narration: When they ask for a feature, always ask: 'What would that let you do?' Keep asking until you get to the real need.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard drawing the connection between surface requests and deeper needs., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Menu Button Story
scenes.narration: A restaurant tech team spent three months building the perfect menu system. Users hated it.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man restaurant server using a stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst ordering system, with a highlighted 'Same Again' glowing control crystal glowing., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Real Problem
scenes.narration: When they observed servers, they discovered the real problem: servers needed to enter orders faster, not better organization.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man restaurant server using a stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst ordering system, with a highlighted 'Same Again' glowing control crystal glowing., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Simple Fix
scenes.narration: A simple 'Same Again' button increased orders-per-minute by 40%.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man restaurant server using a stone tablets with glowing inscriptionst ordering system, with a highlighted 'Same Again' glowing control crystal glowing., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Document Your Pain Points
scenes.narration: For each pain point, document the source and whether it's stated or unstated.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur, Arab woman completing a pain point analysis carved mountain stone marker at a cliff-side maker lab., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Complete Analysis
scenes.narration: Also capture frequency, severity, current workaround, and the underlying need. This analysis will guide your product design.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial woma Black woman entrepreneur, African American woman completing a pain point analysis carved mountain stone marker at a cliff-side maker lab., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Finding the Real Problem
scenes.narration: Pain points are symptoms. If you only address symptoms, problems keep coming back.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur examining multiple layers of a mountain cross-section, revealing deeper root systems., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Dig Beneath the Surface
scenes.narration: Root cause analysis digs beneath the surface to find what's actually causing the pain — so you can solve it once and for all.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur examining multiple layers of a mountain cross-section, revealing deeper root systems., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The 5 Whys Technique
scenes.narration: The 5 Whys is deceptively simple. Keep asking 'why?' until you reach the root cause.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard with five descending levels, each marked with glowing symbols 'Why' with arrows connecting them., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Five Levels Deep
scenes.narration: Usually takes about five iterations. Why one reveals the surface symptom. Why two finds the immediate cause. Why three uncovers contributing factors.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard with five descending levels, each marked with glowing symbols 'Why' with arrows connecting them., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Finding Root Causes
scenes.narration: Why four exposes systemic issues. Why five reveals the true root cause. Don't stop at the first reasonable answer — keep digging.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur at a whiteboard with five descending levels, each marked with glowing symbols 'Why' with arrows connecting them., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Fishbone Diagrams
scenes.narration: The Fishbone diagram visualizes all potential causes of a problem, organized by category.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur drawing a fishbone visual metaphor with glowing pathways on a large planning surface at the maker lab., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Four Standard Categories
scenes.narration: Four standard categories: People, Process, Technology, and Environment. Adapt these to your context.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur drawing a fishbone visual metaphor with glowing pathways on a large planning surface at the maker lab., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Case Study: HomeHero
scenes.narration: HomeHero had 23% booking completion versus 35% industry average.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur reviewing analytics data showing conversion improvements on multiple screens., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Three Root Causes
scenes.narration: Root cause analysis revealed three issues: visitors couldn't see cleaner profiles before booking, users had to commit to a time before seeing price, and the mobile calendar was frustrating.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur reviewing analytics data showing conversion improvements on multiple screens., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Results
scenes.narration: After implementing fixes, conversion improved from 23% to 38%.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur reviewing analytics data showing conversion improvements on multiple screens., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Prioritize Root Causes
scenes.narration: Not all root causes are equally important. You need to prioritize.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial ma Hispanic man entrepreneur, Latino man ranking root causes on a priority constellation of glowing waypoints board at the maker lab., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Prioritization Criteria
scenes.narration: Prioritize based on how many customers are affected, severity of pain, whether it's within your control, and if fixing it unlocks other improvements.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial man Asian woman entrepreneur, East Asian woman ranking root causes on a priority constellation of glowing waypoints board at the maker lab., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Fine Line
scenes.narration: MVP stands for Minimum Viable Product. The key word is minimum.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur looking at two paths: one cluttered with features, one clean and focused, at a mountain crossroads., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Gold-Plating Trap
scenes.narration: Yet entrepreneurs constantly 'gold-plate' their MVPs, adding features that feel essential but aren't.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur looking at two paths: one cluttered with features, one clean and focused, at a mountain crossroads., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Untested Hypotheses
scenes.narration: Every feature you add before launch is a hypothesis you're not testing.
scenes.visualDescription: A Latina woman entrepreneur looking at two paths: one cluttered with features, one clean and focused, at a mountain crossroads., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Principle 1: Solve One Problem
scenes.narration: Four principles for MVP success. Solve one problem well - users forgive missing features if you nail the core.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur at a planning board with four principle cards, striking through unnecessary features., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Principle 2: Manual Before Automated
scenes.narration: Manual before automated - learn what matters before coding.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur at a planning board with four principle cards, striking through unnecessary features., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Principle 3: Fake the Back End
scenes.narration: Fake the back end - users see the front end.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur at a planning board with four principle cards, striking through unnecessary features., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Principle 4: Set a Time Box
scenes.narration: And set a time box - whatever isn't done gets cut, not delayed.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur at a planning board with four principle cards, striking through unnecessary features., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Feature Decision Matrix
scenes.narration: Evaluate every feature on Impact and Effort.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur mapping features onto a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints with impact and effort axes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The 2x2 Matrix
scenes.narration: High impact, low effort? Do it first. High impact, high effort? Include only if essential.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur mapping features onto a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints with impact and effort axes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Apply the Matrix
scenes.narration: Low impact, low effort? Maybe for version 1.1. Low impact, high effort? Cut it from your roadmap entirely.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur mapping features onto a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints with impact and effort axes., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: What is COTS?
scenes.narration: COTS means Commercial Off-The-Shelf. Before building anything custom, ask: can I buy or borrow this?
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur selecting tools from a rack of ready-made solutions at a mountain supply station., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Ready-Made Tools
scenes.narration: Use existing tools for authentication, payments, scheduling, forms, email, and landing pages.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur selecting tools from a rack of ready-made solutions at a mountain supply station., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Build Only What Differentiates
scenes.narration: Only build custom when no existing tool works for your specific differentiator.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur selecting tools from a rack of ready-made solutions at a mountain supply station., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Be Ruthless
scenes.narration: If a feature doesn't directly address your top root causes, it doesn't belong in your MVP. Be ruthless.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur crossing out features on a list with confident determination at the maker lab., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Build to Learn
scenes.narration: The goal isn't to build something perfect - it's to build something that teaches you what perfect would look like.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur crossing out features on a list with confident determination at the maker lab., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: From MVP to Full Vision
scenes.narration: Your MVP is Version 1.0 — but what comes after? A roadmap gives you a clear path from your initial offering to your full vision.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur looking at a glowing mountain path with multiple waypoints leading to a summit., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Stay Flexible
scenes.narration: The key is to plan enough to have direction, but not so much that you're locked into decisions made before you had customer data.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur looking at a glowing mountain path with multiple waypoints leading to a summit., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Version 1.0: Your MVP
scenes.narration: Think of your product evolution in versions. Version 1.0, your MVP, validates the core value proposition with your first paying customers.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur with three expedition flags on a mountain representing different product versions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Version 1.5: Improvements
scenes.narration: Version 1.5 addresses top customer feedback with quality of life improvements. This is where you respond to what real users are telling you.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur with three expedition flags on a mountain representing different product versions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Version 2.0: Expansion
scenes.narration: Version 2.0 expands to adjacent problems with major new capabilities. But here's the critical warning...
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur with three expedition flags on a mountain representing different product versions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Version 2.0 Warning
scenes.narration: Don't plan Version 2.0 in detail until Version 1.0 is in customers' hands. What you learn from real usage will change everything.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur with three expedition flags on a mountain representing different product versions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Now/Next/Later Framework
scenes.narration: Instead of detailed timelines that become obsolete, use the Now/Next/Later framework to organize your roadmap.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing feature cards into three columns marked with glowing symbols Now, Next, and Later on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: NOW: 4-8 Weeks
scenes.narration: NOW is the next 4-8 weeks. These are specific, committed features with resources already allocated. You're 90% confident these will ship.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing feature cards into three columns marked with glowing symbols Now, Next, and Later on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: NEXT: 2-3 Months
scenes.narration: NEXT is 2-3 months out. These are planned but flexible features. The general direction is set, but specifics depend on what you learn from NOW. You're 60-70% confident.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing feature cards into three columns marked with glowing symbols Now, Next, and Later on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: LATER: 3+ Months
scenes.narration: LATER is 3+ months out. This is your vision and direction — big ideas worth exploring. But at 20-30% confidence, it's more of a wish list than a commitment.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur organizing feature cards into three columns marked with glowing symbols Now, Next, and Later on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Requirements Tracker
scenes.narration: For each feature in your NOW bucket, create a simple requirements document. This keeps your team aligned and your work focused.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur filling out a requirements carved mountain stone marker with checkboxes at a mountain planning station., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Requirements Template
scenes.narration: Include the feature name, user story, which root cause it addresses, acceptance criteria, dependencies, and effort estimate. Keep it simple but complete.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur filling out a requirements carved mountain stone marker with checkboxes at a mountain planning station., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Week 3 Complete!
scenes.narration: You've transformed customer insights into a clear product direction. You now have an MVP definition, prioritized features, and a flexible roadmap.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of White man entrepreneurs celebrating at the maker lab with a completed product roadmap on display., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Coming Next: Week 4
scenes.narration: Next week, you'll learn how to sell it — starting with the psychology of why people buy. Get ready to master the art of persuasion.
scenes.visualDescription: A diverse group of South Asian woman entrepreneurs celebrating at the maker lab with a completed product roadmap on display., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Murder House Problem
scenes.narration: Sales has a murder house problem. The word itself triggers images of pushy salesmen and manipulative tactics.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur standing outside a beautiful Victorian lodge at a mountain station, metaphor for misperceptions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: But That's Not Reality
scenes.narration: But that's not what sales actually is. The house is fine. The perception isn't.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur standing outside a beautiful Victorian lodge at a mountain station, metaphor for misperceptions., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: What You Think Sales Is
scenes.narration: Most people imagine sales as talking people into things they don't want, using manipulation tactics.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur shaking her head at stereotypical sales imagery shown on a display., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Wrong Archetype
scenes.narration: Being pushy and aggressive, closing at any cost. That's the archetype we all carry - and it's wrong.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur shaking her head at stereotypical sales imagery shown on a display., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: What Sales Actually Is
scenes.narration: Real sales is problem discovery - understanding what someone actually needs.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur in genuine conversation with potential customers at a warm alpine lodge., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Solution Matching
scenes.narration: Solution matching - connecting the right solution to the right problem.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur in genuine conversation with potential customers at a warm alpine lodge., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Trust & Value
scenes.narration: Trust building and value communication - helping someone see how your solution helps them.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur in genuine conversation with potential customers at a warm alpine lodge., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The 3 C's to Avoid
scenes.narration: Never convince - if you have to convince someone, you're talking to the wrong person.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with three red X marks over negative sales tactics displayed on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Never Co-opt
scenes.narration: Never co-opt or manipulate emotions. Creating false urgency destroys trust permanently.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with three red X marks over negative sales tactics displayed on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Never Compel
scenes.narration: Never compel or pressure someone into a purchase. A reluctant customer becomes a resentful customer.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur with three red X marks over negative sales tactics displayed on a planning board., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Sales as Service
scenes.narration: Sales isn't something you do TO people. It's something you do FOR people.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur helping a customer at a mountain lodge, both smiling and engaged in genuine conversation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Service, Not Manipulation
scenes.narration: Helping them solve problems and make good decisions. When you approach it this way, it feels like service, not manipulation.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur helping a customer at a mountain lodge, both smiling and engaged in genuine conversation., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Triangle Model
scenes.narration: The Triangle Model is simple, powerful, and transformative. It explains why some sales relationships thrive while others crash and burn.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur drawing a triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways on a whiteboard in a modern co-working space, pointing to the three vertices., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Three Points
scenes.narration: There are three points: YOU, THEM, and IT. Every sales conversation exists within this triangle.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur drawing a triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways on a whiteboard in a modern co-working space, pointing to the three vertices., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: YOU - The Seller
scenes.narration: YOU is your expertise and credibility. It's what you bring to the table - your knowledge, experience, and genuine desire to help.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur presenting to a small group, with a triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways visible showing the three marked with glowing symbols points., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: THEM - The Buyer
scenes.narration: THEM is your customer's needs and goals. This is what they care about most - their problems, their dreams, their situation.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur presenting to a small group, with a triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways visible showing the three marked with glowing symbols points., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: IT - The Solution
scenes.narration: IT is the product or service you're selling. It's the bridge between you and them. The magic is in how all three connect.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur presenting to a small group, with a triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways visible showing the three marked with glowing symbols points., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Connection: YOU to THEM
scenes.narration: The real power is in the connections between points. YOU to THEM is trust and rapport. Do they believe you understand them?
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur in a coffee shop meeting, with visual lines connecting three people representing the triangle connections., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Connection: THEM to IT
scenes.narration: THEM to IT is whether your solution fits their problem. Does it actually solve what they need?
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur in a coffee shop meeting, with visual lines connecting three people representing the triangle connections., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Connection: YOU to IT
scenes.narration: YOU to IT is your credibility to deliver. Are you the right person to provide this solution?
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur in a coffee shop meeting, with visual lines connecting three people representing the triangle connections., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Problem: The Me Monster
scenes.narration: The Me Monster focuses only on themselves. They talk about their credentials, their experience, their company - but never learn what the customer actually needs.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur looking frustrated at a broken triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways, with red X marks over unbalanced connections., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Problem: The Feature Dump
scenes.narration: The Feature Dump jumps straight to product without building trust. They list every feature, but the customer doesn't trust them yet, so they don't care.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur looking frustrated at a broken triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways, with red X marks over unbalanced connections., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Problem: The Invisible Expert
scenes.narration: The Invisible Expert never establishes why they're the right person to help. They understand the problem perfectly but fail to show their credibility.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur looking frustrated at a broken triangle visual metaphor with glowing pathways, with red X marks over unbalanced connections., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Building the Perfect Triangle
scenes.narration: Great salespeople build all three connections in sequence. First, build rapport. Show genuine curiosity. Establish that you're a real person who cares.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur shaking hands with a client, a balanced glowing triangle overlay symbolizing perfect alignment., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Complete the Triangle
scenes.narration: Then develop relevance - show how your solution addresses their specific problem. Finally, strengthen your credibility with relevant experience and success stories.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur shaking hands with a client, a balanced glowing triangle overlay symbolizing perfect alignment., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: When All Three Connect
scenes.narration: When all three connections are strong, the sale happens naturally. The customer feels understood, sees the value, and trusts you to deliver.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur shaking hands with a client, a balanced glowing triangle overlay symbolizing perfect alignment., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: People Buy for Their Reasons
scenes.narration: Here's the fundamental truth of sales: nobody cares about your product. They care about their problems.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial Middle Eastern man entrepreneur couple in a strategy session, with thought bubbles showing customer concerns and motivations., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Their Goals, Their Aspirations
scenes.narration: They care about their goals, their fears and aspirations. Your product is just a means to their end.
scenes.visualDescription: A multiracial White woman entrepreneur couple in a strategy session, with thought bubbles showing customer concerns and motivations., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Friedman Model
scenes.narration: Milton Friedman identified four ways money is spent. Each creates different buying behavior.
scenes.visualDescription: An East Asian man professor-type entrepreneur drawing a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints on a glass board, explaining the four quadrants., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Spending Your Own Money
scenes.narration: The key question: whose money is being spent, and for whom? When it's your money, you care about cost.
scenes.visualDescription: An East Asian man professor-type entrepreneur drawing a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints on a glass board, explaining the four quadrants., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Spending Others' Money
scenes.narration: When spending others' money on yourself, quality matters most. When spending others' money on others, accountability is lowest.
scenes.visualDescription: An East Asian man professor-type entrepreneur drawing a 2x2 constellation of glowing waypoints on a glass board, explaining the four quadrants., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: B2C: Business to Consumer
scenes.narration: B2C is emotional and fast. Individual decision makers, shorter sales cycles, and personal benefit drives the purchase.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur presenting three different sales scenarios on separate screens - retail, corporate, and government settings., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: B2B: Business to Business

scenes.heading: B2G: Business to Government

scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur presenting three different sales scenarios on separate screens - retail, corporate, and government settings., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: The Buyer's Journey
scenes.narration: Every buyer goes through predictable stages. Understanding where they are determines how you should engage.

scenes.heading: Awareness & Consideration
scenes.narration: First, Awareness: they realize they have a problem. Then Consideration: they're actively comparing options.

scenes.heading: Decision & Action
scenes.narration: Then Decision: they've narrowed options and are ready to choose. Finally Action: they buy and begin using your solution.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur walking through a path with four distinct gates, each marked with glowing symbols with a buyer journey stage., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Know Your Buyer

scenes.heading: Meet Them Where They Are
scenes.narration: Buying decisions are made based on the buyer's logic, within the buyer's context. Your job is to understand that context.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur in deep conversation with a potential client, showing empathy and understanding through body language., warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: Know Your Customer Deeply

scenes.heading: Beyond Surface Level
scenes.narration: Not because of how they look, but because of how they think, what they fear, and what they aspire to.

scenes.heading: Your ICP Purpose

scenes.heading: Demographics & Psychographics
scenes.narration: Demographics tell you who they are. Psychographics tell you why they buy.

scenes.narration: Online hooks follow the WHO + WHAT + WHY formula: I help WHO to do WHAT so they can WHY.

scenes.heading: Face-to-Face Hook

scenes.heading: Always Have a B-Side

scenes.heading: Why Have a B-Side?
scenes.narration: This gives you flexibility and helps you discover unexpected product-market fit.
scenes.visualDescription: A strategic planning board showing the benefits of having multiple customer profiles., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting

scenes.heading: ICP as Hypothesis
scenes.narration: Your ICP isn't set in stone. It's a hypothesis you're constantly refining based on who actually buys, stays, and refers.
scenes.visualDescription: The South Asian man entrepreneur updating her customer profile cards with new insights, showing the iterative nature of ICP development., at a mountain expedition waystation, warm golden hour lighting, misty mountain peaks in background, adventure expedition aesthetic, stylized digital painting
